info.en:
Server Configuration
Present: 8-16 core, 16 GB + RAM, 128GB + SSD; for personal and community Testnet node
Expected: 32-64 core, 256GB + RAM, 512TB SSD; for node launch, and another 10 TB for node storage

Group Introduction:
Based in Seattle, Blockgenic strives to be a reliable blockchain producer, an EOS ecology supporter and a contributor to EOS development. We attach great importance to the safety and transparency of our system so that our tasks can be successfully completed. In addition, we are planning to bring EOS community members together through various theme-based parties.
 
Find us:
Twitter
https://twitter.com/blockgenic
Steemit
https://steemit.com/@block21
info.zh_CN:
服务器配置
目前使用8-16核心，16 GB + RAM，128GB + SSD用于私人Testnet和社区Testnet节点
预计32 -64核心，256GB + RAM，512TB SSD用于启动节点，额外10 TB用于存储节点
团队介绍
Blockgenic的总部位于西雅图，我们期待成为一个值得信赖和值得信赖的区块生产者。始终支持EOS生态系统，并为开发EOS做出贡献。我们非常重视安全性和透明度，并确保始终使我们的系统完成任务。我们还计划通过关于不同主题的各种聚会将EOS社区聚集在一起。
联系方式
Twitter
https://twitter.com/blockgenic
Steemit
https://steemit.com/@block21
